roleset.name: within the skull/vertebrae, but outside the brain/spine

example.name: arg1
example.text: Brain MRI revealed single focal 9 x 9 mm enhancing lesion in the right central skull base adjacent to the medial temporal lobe and just above the Petrus apex and appears to be extra-axial
example.arg: single focal 9 x 9 mm enhancing lesion in the right central skull base adjacent to the medial temporal lobe and just above the Petrus apex

roleset.note: EXTRAAXIAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from extraaxial.01-j)
